amendment.description: Amendment clarifies language in the bill; authorizes $1.5 billion to cover increased security expenses at airports; authorizes the deputization of airport screeners as Federal transportation security agents; and provides for a limitation on liability for damages arising out of crashes of Sept. 11, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order pursuant to section 3 of H. Res. 274.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 202 (Roll no. 421).
